learning_objectives.description: Carry out calculations and solve problems involving the surface area and volume of a: cuboid, prism, cylinder, sphere, pyramid, cone.

subtopic.notes_and_examples:
Answers may be asked for in terms of π.
The following formulas are given in the List of formulas:
• curved surface area of a cylinder
• curved surface area of a cone
• surface area of a sphere
• volume of a prism
• volume of a pyramid
• volume of a cylinder
• volume of a cone
• volume of a sphere.
The term prism refers to any solid with a uniform cross-section, e.g. a cylindrical sector.
